simplified: 舍得一身剐，敢把皇帝拉下马

pronunciation.pinyin: shě de yī shēn guǎ , gǎn bǎ huáng dì lā xià mǎ
pronunciation.wade_giles_pinyin: she3 de5 yi1 shen1 gua3 , gan3 ba3 huang2 di4 la1 xia4 ma3

details.simplified: 舍得一身剐，敢把皇帝拉下马
details.traditional: 捨得一身剮，敢把皇帝拉下馬

meanings.value: one who does not fear the death of thousand cuts will dare to unhorse the emperor (proverb)
to a fearless person, no fence is high enough
